about_the_game:
"Spiders live in a happy home."

Explore a story of real life horrors mixed with supernatural. In this prologue, you play as Emily, whose life is about to change in a way that no one could have predicted. Dive into an intriguing story with amazing hand-drawn visuals in this mix of a text-based game and 2D exploration.

  • Begin a new mystery

  • Make decisions while progressing through the story

  • Explore Emily's home

  • Fight things that scare you with a flashlight

Just a bite

The prologue will take approximately 10-20 minutes to play, depending on your reading speed. It is an introduction to a longer story, although the future of the game is still uncertain.

First project

This is a student project created as a part of a course at JAMK University of Applied Sciences. This was the first full game project for everyone in the team, and was made in approximately 9 weeks. Any and all feedback is welcome!

name: Happy Home: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 670 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 680 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explore the beginning of a new horrifying story in this mixture of a text-based and a 2D game. Emily's world is about to turn upside down, maybe in more ways than anyone is able to realize yet.
